heroes-assemble.title: Heroes Assemble
heroes-assemble.description: Heroes Assemble is a strategy-packed adventure where you unite legendary heroes across eras. Craft unique strategies by pairing them with adorable, powerful pets. Dive into unpredictable dungeons with Rogue-like elements for endless surprises. Challenge yourself with thrilling modes like boss battles, arenas, alliances, and more. Your choices shape every epic moment!

HomeIframe.title: Heroes Assemble
HomeIframe.description: Experience the ultimate strategy-packed adventure in Heroes Assemble. Unite legendary heroes, craft unique strategies, and dive into unpredictable dungeons for endless surprises!

HomeFeatures.whatIsDescription: Heroes Assemble is a strategy-packed adventure where you unite legendary heroes across eras. Craft unique strategies by pairing them with adorable, powerful pets. Dive into unpredictable dungeons with Rogue-like elements for endless surprises.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep1: Collect heroes and pets to build a powerful team.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep2: Challenge levels, explore dungeons, and participate in competitions.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep3: Use strategy and resource management to complete various tasks and adventures.
HomeFeatures.feature1Description: Unite heroes from different eras to create the ultimate team.
HomeFeatures.feature2Description: Pair your heroes with adorable yet powerful pets for unique strategies.
HomeFeatures.feature3Description: Dive into dungeons with Rogue-like elements for endless surprises.
HomeFeatures.feature4Description: Challenge yourself with boss battles, arenas, alliances, and more.
